StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateEventOutcome]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OutcomeId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @EventId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @AppointmentOutcomeId INT, @InterviewOutcomeId INT = NULL, @DqNote VARCHAR(50) = NULL, @LastUpdatedBy UNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS IF @InterviewOutcomeId = 0 BEGIN SET @InterviewOutcomeId = NULL END
IF EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOutcome] WHERE ID = @OutcomeId) BEGIN -- if @intCount > 0, then the Record already exists. UPDATE. UPDATE [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOutcome] SET AppointmentOutcomeId = @AppointmentOutcomeId, InterviewOutcomeId = @InterviewOutcomeId, LastUpdateDate = GETDATE (), LastUpdateUserId = @LastUpdatedBy WHERE ID = @OutcomeId END ELSE BEGIN -- if @intCount = 0, then the Record does not exist. INSERT. INSERT INTO [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOutcome] (ID, EventId, AppointmentOutcomeId, InterviewOutcomeId, LastUpdateDate, LastUpdateUserId) VALUES (@OutcomeId, @EventId, @AppointmentOutcomeId, @InterviewOutcomeId, GETDATE (), @LastUpdatedBy)
--ECP 390 Automa.c Disposi.on Update DECLARE @ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @Recrui.ngOrganiza.onID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @Recrui.ngPersonID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
SET @ProspectId = (SELECT TOP 1 p.ProspectId FROM RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.SubjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE e.ID = @EventId)
SELECT @Recrui.ngOrganiza.onID = Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, @Recrui.ngPersonID = Recrui.ngPersonId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect WHERE ProspectId = @ProspectId
--Prospect exist and Show (1) and (Temp DQ (3) or Perm DQ (4) ) IF @ProspectId IS NOT NULL AND @AppointmentOutcomeId = 1 AND @InterviewOutcomeId IN (3, 4) BEGIN IF @LastUpdatedBy IS NULL BEGIN SET @LastUpdatedBy = @Recrui.ngPersonID END
--@InterviewOutcomeId 3, 4 matches with disposi.on id 3, 4 INSERT INTO Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory (ProspectID, Disposi.onID, UpdateUserID, UpdateDate, rowguid) VALUES (@ProspectId, @InterviewOutcomeId, @LastUpdatedBy, GETDATE (), NEWID ())
UPDATE Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect SET ProspectDisposi.onId = @InterviewOutcomeId, TDQRemark = @DqNote, LastUpdateDate = GETDATE (), LastUpdateUserId = @LastUpdatedBy WHERE ProspectId = @ProspectId
END END
